        Concatenate two arrays.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the array elements.
        Parameters:
        first - The first array.
        second - The second array
        Returns:

        Create a final HashSet from a collection of elements.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the set elements.
        Parameters:
        elements - The elements to be added in the HashSet.
        Returns:
